original_title: Nazi UFOs: How They Fly: Exposing German Tesla Free Energy Program
overview: Paul Scarzo interviews author and researcher William R. Lyne. The topic covered in this documentary is alternative forms of propulsion and energy creation methods. The focus is some work done by Nikola Tesla, and that of German scientists under the Third Reich.
tagline: Exposing The German Tesla Anti-Gravity & Free Energy Program
title: Nazi UFOs: How They Fly: Exposing German Tesla Free Energy Program
